name: Steam Flesh and Bones
description:
This is a Game Development Degree's project, put together by a team of 6 talented students over the course of six months.

SFB is a Steampunk horror game, all made in pixel art, explore Dr. Moreau's secret lab, full of horrible and deformed animals, turned into super soldiers and destroy his plans.

(Portuguese Only!!)

Caiê Franco - Documentation

Fernando Galinskas - Monster design and animation; assets

Gabriel Mori - Scripting

Lua Terra - Main Character design and animation

Matheus Junqueira - Scripting and Sound Design

Max Carlin - Assets and background
